SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT billing_cycle_id, elp_dealer.dealer_name, billing_cycle_code, start_day, end_day, billing_run_date_offset_days FROM elp_billing_cycle, elp_dealer, elp_company
WHERE --dynamic_in_clause and elp_billing_cycle.dealer_id = elp_dealer.dealer_id and elp_dealer.company_id = elp_company.company_id --dynamic_where_clause --dynamic_order_by_clause
